maker_music_makerthins_001.mp4.title: Paper Airplane: Relive Childhood Dreams, Unleash Freedom and Hope! #ChildhoodMemories #PaperAirplane
maker_music_makerthins_001.mp4.description: A paper airplane carries our beautiful childhood memories and endless hope for the future. Let's fly our dreams together and rediscover simple joys!
maker_music_makerthins_001.mp4.summary: 怀旧情感、童年记忆、梦想、自由、简单快乐。

maker_music_makerthins_025.mp4.title: City's End: When Glamour Fades, Only the Desolate "END" Remains #UrbanExploration #Apocalypse #Dystopian
maker_music_makerthins_025.mp4.description: At the edge of the city, a sign with "END" and an abandoned bicycle tell the story of decline behind prosperity. Do you also feel this apocalyptic loneliness?
maker_music_makerthins_025.mp4.summary: 城市衰败、末日感、反乌托邦氛围、对未来的隐喻。

maker_music_makerthins_011.mp4.title: Father and Son at Sunset: Silent Backs, Untold Love and Sorrow #FatherSon #MiddleEast #Emotion
maker_music_makerthins_011.mp4.description: Under the glow of the setting sun, a father and his son stand quietly on a city rooftop. What kind of story lies between them? How much love and sorrow is contained in this silence?
maker_music_makerthins_011.mp4.summary: 情感氛围、父子关系、文化背景。

maker_music_makerthins_005.mp4.title: Shocking Moment: The Fate of an Ant Under a Bicycle Tire! #Microcosm #Nature
maker_music_makerthins_005.mp4.description: Witness the fate of an ant under a bicycle tire in this close-up view, and feel the fragility of life and the cruelty of nature. What thoughts does this microcosm bring to us?
maker_music_makerthins_005.mp4.summary: 微观视角、残酷瞬间、生命脆弱。

maker_music_makerthins_015.mp4.summary: 简约的视觉风格、忧郁的人物形象、黑白电影的艺术感。

maker_music_makerthins_022.mp4.description: An empty stage, only a chair waiting silently. What is it waiting for? An actor? A story? A memory? Experience the charm and solitude of the stage in black and white.
